docs.snippet: Every one of Tom Izzo’s senior classes at Michigan State has reached at least one Final Four. With the Spartans’ razor-thin victory over Virginia, this year’s group has a shot....
docs.lead_paragraph: Every one of Tom Izzo’s senior classes at Michigan State has reached at least one Final Four. With the Spartans’ razor-thin victory over Virginia, this year’s group has a shot.
docs.abstract: Michigan State defeats Virginia, 61-59, in the NCAA men's basketball tournament Round of 16.

headline.main: With Win Over Virginia, Michigan State’s Izzo Is Again One Step Away
headline.print_headline: Once Again, Izzo Is One Step Away

docs.snippet: Tennessee whittled Michigan’s lead to 72-71 with six seconds left, but Jarnell Stokes was called for a charge against the senior Wolverines forward Jordan Morgan....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tennessee whittled Michigan’s lead to 72-71 with six seconds left, but Jarnell Stokes was called for a charge against the senior Wolverines forward Jordan Morgan.
docs.abstract: Michigan defeats Tennessee, 73-71, in the NCAA men's basketball tournament Round of 16.

headline.main: Tennessee Comeback Brewing, Michigan Senior Steps In
headline.print_headline: Rout Turns to Nail-Biter for Michigan

docs.snippet: Turner and CBS are approaching local radio announcers for alternative, hometown-style broadcasts of Final Four games, but loyalty and corporate obligations are keeping those announcers home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turner and CBS are approaching local radio announcers for alternative, hometown-style broadcasts of Final Four games, but loyalty and corporate obligations are keeping those announcers home.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that Turner Network Television and CBS are approaching local radio announcers to add hometown color to national broadcasts of Final Four games in the NCAA men's tournament, but that many are opting out due to hometown loyalty and obligations to radio networks.

headline.main: Local Voices Aren’t So Eager to Go National
headline.print_headline: Local Voices Aren’t So Eager to Go National

docs.snippet: Archie Miller took Dayton on an expected run. Sean Miller came up just short of the Final Four again....
docs.lead_paragraph: Archie Miller took Dayton on an expected run. Sean Miller came up just short of the Final Four again.

headline.main: Millers Both Knocked Out in Elite Eight
headline.print_headline: Millers Both Knocked Out in Elite Eight
